title: Ticket #1307: dprintf should (optionally) log file name and line number (D_FILELINE)
description: dprintf should include the filename and line number that the dprintf occurs on. A macro can probably be shanghaied into making it automatic. The add D_FILELINE to the debug levels, which adds the filename and line number to the output. This would be useful in tracking program flow.
